snippet.title: We visited Amazon's massive US jobs fair at a warehouse in New Jersey, where people lined up around the block hoping to score a job
snippet.content:
On Wednesday, hosted a colossal, nation-wide jobs fair - Amazon is billing it as the largest in the US.
In an effort to fill 50,000 warehouse jobs at the company, the online retail giant invited people across the county to tour 10 of its warehouses and apply for these jobs in person.
The Robbinsville, New Jersey, warehouse alone had 1,500 jobs up for grabs, . When we stopped by, we watched as hundreds of people turned out to try to snag a role.
